mapper.insert: insert into d_control_type_plugin( alert_type, field_name, field_code, field_order, field_type, field_type_key, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{alertType}, #{fieldName}, #{fieldCode}, #{fieldOrder}, #{fieldType}, #{fieldTypeKey}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update d_control_type_plugin set alert_type = #{controlTypePlugin.alertType}, field_name = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldName}, field_code = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldCode}, field_order = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldOrder}, field_type = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldType}, field_type_key = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldTypeKey}, state = #{controlTypePlugin.state}, iscancel = #{controlTypePlugin.iscancel}, remark = #{controlTypePlugin.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, alert_type AS alertType, field_name AS fieldName, field_code AS fieldCode, field_order AS fieldOrder, field_type AS fieldType, field_type_key AS fieldTypeKey, state, iscancel, remark from d_control_type_plugin where id = #{id}

select id, alert_type AS alertType, field_name AS fieldName, field_code AS fieldCode, field_order AS fieldOrder, field_type AS fieldType, field_type_key AS fieldTypeKey, state, iscancel, remark from d_control_type_plugin where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into d_control_type_plugin
id,
alert_type,
field_name,
field_code,
field_order,
field_type,
field_type_key,
state,
iscancel,
remark,

mapper.update:
update d_control_type_plugin
id = #{controlTypePlugin.id,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
alert_type = #{controlTypePlugin.alertType,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
field_name = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldName,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
field_code = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldCode,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
field_order = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldOrder,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
field_type = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldType,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
field_type_key = #{controlTypePlugin.fieldTypeKey,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
state = #{controlTypePlugin.state,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
iscancel = #{controlTypePlugin.iscancel,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
remark = #{controlTypePlugin.remark,jdbcType=${field.mybatisType}},
where id = #{id}
